text: Dung i didok nasida ma tu ibana: Ro do sahalak nangkok mangambat hami, didok ma tu hami: Laho ma hamu mulak tu raja, na marsuru hamu, dok hamu ma tu ibana: Songon on do hata ni Jahowa: Tung na so adong be huroha Debata di halak Israel umbahen marsuru ho manungkunhon tu Baal Zebub, debata di Ekron? Dibahen i ndang jadi be ho morot sian podomanmon, ingkon mate na ma ho!
